settings.source:
function run(dateTimeOffset, startDate, endDate, tokenBlipAth, workDays, apiUrl, apiToken, idBlip, psuserInputHowCanHelp, psintentIdentified, psuserInputCpf, psisNet, psisClaro, psphoneAccountType, psuserInputZipcode, psuserInputHouseNumber) {

    var flowVariablesJs = {
        "dateTimeOffset": dateTimeOffset,
        "startDate": startDate,
        "endDate": endDate,
        "tokenBlipAth": tokenBlipAth,
        "workDays": workDays,
        "apiUrl": apiUrl,
        "apiToken": apiToken,
        "idBlip": idBlip,
        "psuserInputHowCanHelp": psuserInputHowCanHelp,
        "psintentIdentified": psintentIdentified,
        "psuserInputCpf": psuserInputCpf,
        "psisNet":psisNet,
        "psisClaro":psisClaro,
        "psphoneAccountType":psphoneAccountType,
        "psuserInputZipcode": psuserInputZipcode,
        "psuserInputHouseNumber": psuserInputHouseNumber
    }

    return flowVariablesJs;
}
